content.question: What services does CodeLens offer?
content.answer:
At CodeLens, we specialize in:
  • Web Development from scratch.
  • Custom Web Design focused on user experience.
  • Enhancement of existing Websites.
  • Web Application Development , such as management systems, inventory control, and more. If you have a specific project in mind, contact us to discuss it!

content.question: What types of businesses or projects do you accept?
content.answer: We focus on working with small and medium-sized businesses, as well as entrepreneurs looking to improve their online presence. Our ideal client is someone who needs a tailored solution to stand out in their industry.

content.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
content.answer: The duration varies depending on the complexity of the project. A standard website typically takes between 4 to 6 weeks. More complex projects, such as custom applications, may take 2 to 3 months. We always provide an estimated timeline at the beginning.

content.question: Do you offer maintenance or support after project completion?
content.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance and support plans to ensure your website or application runs smoothly, with regular updates and security optimization. You can choose the plan that best suits your needs.

content.question: How is the development process structured?
content.answer:
Our development process consists of several phases:
  • Initial Consultation: We discuss your goals and requirements.
  • Planning and Design: We create a proposal and initial design.
  • Development: We build the website or application based on the agreed design.
  • Testing and Launch: We test every aspect before making the project live. We maintain constant communication in each phase to keep you updated on the progress.

content.question: How much does a web development project or application cost?
content.answer: The cost depends on the complexity of the project and the specific features you require. We offer personalized quotes after an initial consultation to understand your needs.

content.question: What technologies do you use for web development?
content.answer: At CodeLens, we work with modern technologies tailored to each project type, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and databases like MongoDB or MySQL, among others. This allows us to build scalable and efficient solutions.

content.question: Can I make changes or updates to my site after it's launched?
content.answer: Yes, our websites are designed to be flexible. You can make small content updates, or we can assist you with more complex modifications. We also offer maintenance plans for periodic changes.

content.question: Do I need technical knowledge to work with CodeLens?
content.answer: No, it's not necessary. We handle the entire technical process, from design to development. Just share your vision and objectives with us, and we'll help bring them to life.

content.question: Can I see examples of previous projects?
content.answer: Of course! You can visit our 'Portfolio' section to see some of the projects we've completed for other clients. Each one reflects our commitment to quality and customization in every design.

content.question: What payment options are available?
content.answer: We offer various payment options, including bank transfers, credit cards, and payments through secure platforms like PayPal. We adapt to what is most convenient for you.

content.question: Is an upfront payment required to start the project?
content.answer: Yes, we usually require a 30% deposit of the total cost before starting development. This allows us to secure the necessary resources and team for your project.

content.question: Can I pay in installments?
content.answer: Yes, we can set up an installment payment plan, especially for larger projects. We will provide you with a clear and transparent payment schedule.

content.question: Does the price include updates and support after delivery?
content.answer: Our services include an initial support and adjustment period after delivery. For ongoing updates or support, we offer maintenance plans tailored to your needs.

content.question: What happens if I want to add new features after the project has started?
content.answer: If you need to include new functionalities, we will evaluate the changes and provide an additional quote to cover the development of the new features.

content.question: Do you offer refunds if the project is canceled?
content.answer: In case of cancellation, we will assess the project's status to determine the costs for the work completed up to that point. Our team will help you find the best solution in such situations.

content: At CodeLens, protecting your personal information is our priority. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data when you use our website or services.

privacy-section.title: Introduction
privacy-section.content: At CodeLens, we are committed to respecting your privacy and protecting your personal information in accordance with applicable privacy laws, including the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA).

privacy-section.title: Information We Collect
privacy-section.content: We collect different categories of personal information, including: Personally identifiable information: name, email address, phone number, mailing address. Payment data: information related to payments made for our products or services. Browsing data: information automatically collected while browsing our site (IP address, browser type, pages visited, etc.). Usage data: information about how you use our website, services, and products.

privacy-section.title: How We Use Your Information
privacy-section.content: We use your personal information for specific purposes, such as: Order processing: managing purchases and transactions. Service improvement: optimizing the user experience on our website. Communication: sending you important information about our services, promotions, or account updates. Legal compliance: ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.

privacy-section.content: We are committed to not selling, renting, or sharing your personal information with third parties for commercial purposes without your prior consent, except in the following situations: Service providers: we share your information with third parties who assist us with specific functions, such as payment processing or shipping management. Legal compliance: we may disclose your personal information if required by law or necessary to protect our rights, security, or those of third parties.

privacy-section.title: Protecting Your Information
privacy-section.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. This includes the use of encryption technologies and other physical and technical protections.

privacy-section.title: Your Rights Over Your Personal Information
privacy-section.content: In accordance with applicable laws, you have the following rights regarding your personal information: Access: You can request to review the information we hold about you. Rectification: You can request corrections to your personal data if it is incorrect. Deletion: You can request the deletion of your personal data, subject to legal or contractual requirements. Objection to processing: You can object to certain data processing activities, such as direct marketing. To exercise your rights, contact us at codelens.ar@gmail.com.

privacy-section.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
privacy-section.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website. These tools allow us to: Identify you when you return to our site. Record preferences and personalize content. Analyze site usage. You can set your browser to reject cookies or notify you each time a cookie is sent. However, this may affect your experience on our site.

privacy-section.title: International Data Transfers
privacy-section.content: We do not transfer your personal information except in cases necessary for the provision of our services (e.g., a payment service provider).

privacy-section.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacy-section.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any updates will be posted on this page with the date of the last revision. We recommend checking this page regularly to stay informed about potential changes.
